name: Live Fire
description:
Live Fire

Hi, I'm Dima, a small game developer at the beginning of the road and with big dreams. 

This is the first game i made, especially to enter the world of game developers. It is a small prototype in which you have to stay alive using fire to destroy enemies.

At the moment I deal with the technique I have, those who want to support me in a certain way I will be grateful.

Leave feedback on whether or not you liked the game. Thanks😊
